con:config.script:
def forecastCategoryPropertyName = context.expand( '${DataSource#ForecastCategoryPropertyName}' )
log.info(forecastCategoryPropertyName) switch (forecastCategoryPropertyName){ case "CPSAlert1" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS1WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS1WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert2" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS2WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS2WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert3" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS3WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS3WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert4" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS4WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS4WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert5" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS5WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS5WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert6" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS6WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS6WithAlerts' break
default : testRunner.gotoStepByName("DeleteCPSWithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step Output Data' }

<VolumeForecastModelType> <VolumeForecastModel ModelName="Daily Trend"/> </VolumeForecastModelType>
<ReforecastingPropertyInformation> <ReforecastingProperty NumberOfReforecastPerWeeks="0" NumberOfReforecastWeeksOfHistory="" IsAutomatic="" NumberOfReforecastBlackoutPeriod="" PreReforecastNotification="" PostReforecastNotification="" ReforecastAlertThreshold=""/> </ReforecastingPropertyInformation> </ForecastCategoryProperty> </Request> </Kronos_WFC>

con:config.script:
def forecastCategoryPropertyName = context.expand( '${DataSource#ForecastCategoryPropertyName}' )
log.info(forecastCategoryPropertyName) switch (forecastCategoryPropertyName){ case "CPSAlert1" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS1WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS1WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert2" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS2WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS2WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert3" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS3WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS3WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert4" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS4WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS4WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert5" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS5WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS5WithAlerts' break
case "CPSAlert6" : testRunner.gotoStepByName("LoadCPS6WithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step LoadCPS6WithAlerts' break
default : testRunner.gotoStepByName("DeleteCPSWithAlerts") log.info 'Goto step Output Data' }
